title: Quantum statistics from classical simulations via generative Gibbs sampling
summary: Accurate simulation of nuclear quantum effects is essential for molecular modeling but expensive using path integral molecular dynamics (PIMD). We present GG-PI, a ring-polymer-based framework that combines generative modeling of the single-bead conditional density with Gibbs sampling to recover quantum statistics from classical simulation data. GG-PI uses inexpensive standard classical simulations or existing data for training and allows transfer across temperatures without retraining. On standard test systems, GG-PI significantly reduces wall clock time compared to PIMD. Our approach extends easily to a wide range of problems with similar Markov structure.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为GG-PI的新框架，它利用生成式Gibbs采样从经典模拟数据中恢复量子统计，显著减少了计算成本，且无需重新训练即可在不同温度间转移。
AI.motivation: 传统的路径积分分子动力学(PIMD)方法能够准确模拟核量子效应，但计算成本高昂。为了解决这一问题，研究者寻求一种更高效的方法，能够在不牺牲准确性的前提下降低计算负担。
AI.method: GG-PI框架结合了生成式建模和Gibbs采样，通过学习单珠条件密度分布p τ(xi|x−i)来从经典模拟数据中恢复量子统计。该方法使用廉价的经典模拟或现有数据进行训练，并允许在不同温度下进行转移，而无需重新训练。
AI.result: 在标准测试系统上，GG-PI显著减少了与PIMD相比的时钟时间，并且轻量级的生成模型（约10^5参数）足以实现高保真度的单珠条件分布采样。
AI.conclusion: GG-PI提供了一种高效且可转移的方法来模拟核量子效应，有望广泛应用于具有类似马尔可夫结构的各种问题，为分子建模提供了一种新的途径。

title: A scalable flow-based approach to mitigate topological freezing
summary: As lattice gauge theories with non-trivial topological features are driven towards the continuum limit, standard Markov Chain Monte Carlo simulations suffer for topological freezing, i.e., a dramatic growth of autocorrelations in topological observables. A widely used strategy is the adoption of Open Boundary Conditions (OBC), which restores ergodic sampling of topology but at the price of breaking translation invariance and introducing unphysical boundary artifacts. In this contribution we summarize a scalable, exact flow-based strategy to remove them by transporting configurations from a prior with a OBC defect to a fully periodic ensemble, and apply it to 4d SU(3) Yang--Mills theory. The method is based on a Stochastic Normalizing Flow (SNF) that alternates non-equilibrium Monte Carlo updates with localized, gauge-equivariant defect coupling layers implemented via masked parametric stout smearing. Training is performed by minimizing the average dissipated work, equivalent to a Kullback--Leibler divergence between forward and reverse non-equilibrium path measures, to achieve more reversible trajectories and improved efficiency. We discuss the scaling with the number of degrees of freedom affected by the defect and show that defect SNFs achieve better performances than purely stochastic non-equilibrium methods at comparable cost. Finally, we validate the approach by reproducing reference results for the topological susceptibility.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种可扩展的基于流的方法来缓解格点量子场论中的拓扑冻结问题，该方法通过将具有开放边界条件（OBC）的配置传输到周期性边界条件（PBC）的集合，从而避免了传统方法中因使用OBC而带来的边界效应和破坏平移不变性。
AI.motivation: 在逼近连续极限时，标准马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛（MCMC）模拟在格点量子场论中会受到拓扑冻结的影响，导致拓扑观测量的自相关性急剧增长。虽然开放边界条件（OBC）可以恢复拓扑的有效采样，但会破坏平移不变性并引入非物理边界伪影。
AI.method: 该方法基于随机归一化流（SNF），它结合了归一化流和非平衡马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛（NE-MCMC）计算。SNF通过交替进行非平衡蒙特卡洛更新和通过掩码参数 Stout 扩散实现的局部、规范等变的缺陷耦合层，在具有OBC缺陷的先验状态和完全周期性集合之间传输配置。训练通过最小化平均耗散功来实现，相当于正向和反向非平衡路径度量之间的 Kullback-Leibler 散度。
AI.result: 研究结果表明，缺陷SNF在可比成本下优于纯粹的随机非平衡方法，并且该方法可以很好地扩展到受影响自由度的数量。通过重现拓扑易感性参考结果，验证了该方法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提供了一种可扩展且精确的流方法来缓解拓扑冻结问题，为在格点量子场论中进行精确计算开辟了新的途径，并避免了传统方法中因使用OBC而带来的问题。

title: An Empirical Investigation of Neural ODEs and Symbolic Regression for Dynamical Systems
summary: Accurately modelling the dynamics of complex systems and discovering their governing differential equations are critical tasks for accelerating scientific discovery. Using noisy, synthetic data from two damped oscillatory systems, we explore the extrapolation capabilities of Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (NODEs) and the ability of Symbolic Regression (SR) to recover the underlying equations. Our study yields three key insights. First, we demonstrate that NODEs can extrapolate effectively to new boundary conditions, provided the resulting trajectories share dynamic similarity with the training data. Second, SR successfully recovers the equations from noisy ground-truth data, though its performance is contingent on the correct selection of input variables. Finally, we find that SR recovers two out of the three governing equations, along with a good approximation for the third, when using data generated by a NODE trained on just 10% of the full simulation. While this last finding highlights an area for future work, our results suggest that using NODEs to enrich limited data and enable symbolic regression to infer physical laws represents a promising new approach for scientific discovery.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了神经网络常微分方程 (NODEs) 和符号回归 (SR) 在动态系统建模和方程发现方面的能力，发现NODEs可以有效外推，SR可以从有限数据中恢复方程。
AI.motivation: 为了加速科学发现，需要准确地对复杂系统的动态进行建模并发现其控制方程。本文旨在评估NODEs的外推能力和SR从实验数据中恢复方程的能力，并探索将NODEs用于数据增强以支持SR的可能性。
AI.method: 研究人员使用来自两个阻尼振荡系统（cart-pole和生物模型）的噪声合成数据，评估NODEs的外推能力和SR的方程恢复能力。他们比较了SR在直接地面真实数据和由NODE模型生成的数据上的性能，NODE模型仅使用原始模拟数据的10%进行训练。
AI.result: NODEs在动态相似性条件下可以有效外推到新的边界条件。SR可以成功地从噪声地面真实数据中恢复方程，但性能取决于输入变量的选择。使用仅用10%数据训练的NODE生成的数据，SR可以恢复三个控制方程中的两个，并对第三个方程进行了良好的近似。
AI.conclusion: 本文结果表明，利用NODEs来丰富有限数据并支持符号回归推断物理定律是一种有前景的新方法，为科学发现提供了新的途径。

title: Loss Landscape Geometry and the Learning of Symmetries: Or, What Influence Functions Reveal About Robust Generalization
summary: We study how neural emulators of partial differential equation solution operators internalize physical symmetries by introducing an influence-based diagnostic that measures the propagation of parameter updates between symmetry-related states, defined as the metric-weighted overlap of loss gradients evaluated along group orbits. This quantity probes the local geometry of the learned loss landscape and goes beyond forward-pass equivariance tests by directly assessing whether learning dynamics couple physically equivalent configurations. Applying our diagnostic to autoregressive fluid flow emulators, we show that orbit-wise gradient coherence provides the mechanism for learning to generalize over symmetry transformations and indicates when training selects a symmetry compatible basin. The result is a novel technique for evaluating if surrogate models have internalized symmetry properties of the known solution operator.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的诊断技术，通过分析损失函数梯度在对称状态之间的传播，评估神经网络是否学习并利用了物理对称性，从而提高泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 深度学习模拟偏微分方程的解通常在同分布数据上表现良好，但往往无法尊重底层方程的物理对称性，这限制了其泛化能力，并引发了模型是否真正学习物理规律的疑问。
AI.method: 本文引入了一种基于影响函数的诊断方法，该方法测量参数更新在对称相关状态之间的传播，通过计算沿着群轨道评估的损失梯度之间的度量加权重叠来定义对称相关状态。该方法分析了损失景观的局部几何结构，并结合前向传播不变性测试，评估训练动态是否将物理等价配置耦合。
AI.result: 对自回归流体流动模拟器的应用表明，轨道梯度一致性是学习泛化对称变换的关键机制，并指示训练是否选择了与对称性兼容的区域。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了一种新的技术来评估替代模型是否学习了已知解算子的对称属性，为评估架构选择、损失设计和归纳偏差如何促进或阻碍鲁棒泛化提供了原则性工具，并推进了机器学习的可解释性、泛化理论和科学机器学习领域。

title: Techno-economic optimization of a heat-pipe microreactor, part II: multi-objective optimization analysis
summary: Heat-pipe microreactors (HPMRs) are compact and transportable nuclear power systems exhibiting inherent safety, well-suited for deployment in remote regions where access is limited and reliance on costly fossil fuels is prevalent. In prior work, we developed a design optimization framework that incorporates techno-economic considerations through surrogate modeling and reinforcement learning (RL)-based optimization, focusing solely on minimizing the levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) by using a bottom-up cost estimation approach. In this study, we extend that framework to a multi-objective optimization that uses the Pareto Envelope Augmented with Reinforcement Learning (PEARL) algorithm. The objectives include minimizing both the rod-integrated peaking factor ($F_{Δh}$) and LCOE -- subject to safety and operational constraints. We evaluate three cost scenarios: (1) a high-cost axial and drum reflectors, (2) a low-cost axial reflector, and (3) low-cost axial and drum reflectors. Our findings indicate that reducing the solid moderator radius, pin pitch, and drum coating angle -- all while increasing the fuel height -- effectively lowers $F_{Δh}$. Across all three scenarios, four key strategies consistently emerged for optimizing LCOE: (1) minimizing the axial reflector contribution when costly, (2) reducing control drum reliance, (3) substituting expensive tri-structural isotropic (TRISO) fuel with axial reflector material priced at the level of graphite, and (4) maximizing fuel burnup. While PEARL demonstrates promise in navigating trade-offs across diverse design scenarios, discrepancies between surrogate model predictions and full-order simulations remain. Further improvements are anticipated through constraint relaxation and surrogate development, constituting an ongoing area of investigation.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了先前基于强化学习的经济技术优化框架，采用多目标优化方法，旨在同时降低热管微堆的峰值功率因子和发电成本，并考虑了安全和运行约束。
AI.motivation: 热管微堆（HPMR）具有安全性和便携性优势，但经济性面临挑战。需要针对性地进行经济优化，以提高其市场竞争力。
AI.method: 使用基于强化学习的帕累托信封算法（PEARL）进行多目标优化，同时最小化功率因子（F ∆h）和发电成本（LCOE），并评估了三种不同的成本情景，考虑了轴向和鼓形反射器的成本。
AI.result: 研究发现，减小固体缓蚀剂半径、销距和鼓形涂层角度，同时增加燃料高度，可以有效降低功率因子。在所有成本情景下，降低轴向反射器贡献、减少控制鼓依赖、替代TRISO燃料以及提高燃料烧用率是降低LCOE的关键策略。
AI.conclusion: PEARL算法在多目标优化中显示出潜力，但代理模型预测与全阶模拟之间存在差异。未来的研究将集中在约束放宽和代理模型改进上，以进一步提高优化效果。

title: Global Plane Waves From Local Gaussians: Periodic Charge Densities in a Blink
summary: We introduce ELECTRAFI, a fast, end-to-end differentiable model for predicting periodic charge densities in crystalline materials. ELECTRAFI constructs anisotropic Gaussians in real space and exploits their closed-form Fourier transforms to analytically evaluate plane-wave coefficients via the Poisson summation formula. This formulation delegates non-local and periodic behavior to analytic transforms, enabling reconstruction of the full periodic charge density with a single inverse FFT. By avoiding explicit real-space grid probing, periodic image summation, and spherical harmonic expansions, ELECTRAFI matches or exceeds state-of-the-art accuracy across periodic benchmarks while being up to $633 \times$ faster than the strongest competing method, reconstructing crystal charge densities in a fraction of a second. When used to initialize DFT calculations, ELECTRAFI reduces total DFT compute cost by up to ~20%, whereas slower charge density models negate savings due to high inference times. Our results show that accuracy and inference cost jointly determine end-to-end DFT speedups, and motivate our focus on efficiency.

AI.tldr: ELECTRAFI是一种快速且可微分的模型，用于预测晶体材料中的周期性电荷密度。它利用高斯函数及其傅里叶变换，实现了比现有方法快633倍的电荷密度重建。
AI.motivation: 现有机器学习方法在加速DFT计算方面存在局限性，尤其是在预测电荷密度方面，计算成本高昂，可能抵消了SCF加速带来的好处。因此，需要一种能够快速且准确地捕捉周期性结构长程依赖性的模型。
AI.method: ELECTRAFI通过在实空间构造各向同性高斯函数，并利用其闭合形式的傅里叶变换，通过泊松求和公式解析地评估平面波系数。该方法将非局部和周期性行为委托给解析变换，只需一次逆FFT即可重建完整的周期性电荷密度。
AI.result: ELECTRAFI在周期性基准测试中优于或达到最先进的准确性，速度提升高达633倍。使用ELECTRAFI初始化DFT计算可将总DFT计算成本降低高达20%。
AI.conclusion: ELECTRAFI证明了准确性和推理成本的联合作用对DFT速度提升至关重要，强调了效率的重要性。该模型为加速DFT计算提供了一种有前景的途径，并为理解化学体系和进行有针对性的干预提供了有价值的工具。
